Lost_desc: Have you lost your credentials? you are welcome to search for a document yourself, find the missing one and we will help you get your document, using a simple way to receive information about the information provided to the police.
Found_desc: If you have picked up another document, immediately submit it to the nearest police station and find out what is missing in the system so that the occupant sees it easily and does not take too long.
Security_desc: When your document is picked up and submitted to the relevant authorities, there is a good chance that it will be returned to you. because there is an additional feature of receiving an SMS and email in case your document has been found
province-des: Select the province where the document issued
district-des: Select the district where the document issued
sector-des: Select the sector where the document issued
content-p: Documents Lost and Found system is Here to help you get back your lost document !
motivation-des: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
mission-des: To help the citizen get back lost document easily in an effective and secured manner.
vision-des: Never again will the document be completely missing in Africa.
